title: Listening to offers on a T206 Portrait of Young. Also, Chance portrait.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: Listening to offers on a T206 Portrait of Young. Also, Chance portrait.
posts.post_content:
First things first. THERE IS NO SMUDGE IN THE GREEN BACKGROUND TO THE LEFT OF THE HEAD.

1909 T206 Young portrait Sweet Caporal 150 back-corner wear and wrinkle in the upper right corner of the green background-listening to offers.

S/h is an additional $4.50. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
T206 Chance yellow portrait-speck of paper loss in flat top of the "5" and "0" on the back of the card and some specks of paper loss in the frame on the right side on the back-$200.00 (sold)
